main.name: Shalin Patel
main.description: Enthusiastic Computer Science student with lots of passion and experience in the computer science realm. Excellent programming skills in multiple languages and a strong background in how to work as a team with admirable communication skills.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description1: • Incoming on the Data Engineering team.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description1: • Developed significant feature on flagship Mobile application using Java and Kotlin increasing 7-day app retention rate by 34%.
work.description2: • Implemented and designed architecture for endpoint aggregators written in Scala achieving a 72% increase in efficiency and a 46% decrease in code.
work.description3: • Formed dashboards in Sisense and tracked metrics in various features to obtain data directly impacting 6 projects.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description1: • Led development of Android application using Java following MVP architecture, active monthly users peaked at 5585.
work.description2: • Implemented regression testing for the above application using Java, JUnit, Mockito, and Espresso allowing for the discovery of 39 bugs and inefficiencies.
work.description3: • Modified microservices using Flask and PostgreSQL improving average endpoint time by 88%.

work.title: Software Development Intern
work.description1: • Implemented a route optimization algorithm in C++ similar to the Travelling Salesman Problem, achieving O(nlog(n)) runtime for the average client use case.
work.description2: • Created a full-stack proof-of-concept using React Native, Apollo GraphQL, and Golang that successfully led to full development.
work.description3: • Contributed to client front-end dashboard using React, Mapbox and tested using Jest.
work.description4: • Developed critical in-production admin dashboard using React, Node, Express, and MongoDB.

work.title: Infrastructure Technologies Services Co-op
work.description1: • Worked with IBM’s Privileged Identity Manager to handle access management for the secure data servers at the Data Center Operations sector in MGCS.
work.description2: • Optimized SQL queries in SSMS sent through PowerBI reports improving time taken by 54%.

project.title: Python | text2emotion | SpotifyAPI | TwitterAPI
project.description1: • A python bot which tweets a generated spotify playlist based on the emotions captured from a tagged tweet using text2emotion.
project.description2: • Won Best Machine Learning Hack at Hacklytics 2021.

project.title: Python | Pandas | MatPlotLib | Scikit-Learn
project.description1: • Program that successfully predicts power generation and irradiation of solar panels with an 88% accuracy.
project.description2: • Cleaned data using pandas, detecting for missing values and replacing them with their respective means.
project.description3: • Performed EDA using MatPlotLib to graph the data, identify trends and form initial hypotheses.
project.description4: • Implemented DecisionTree and XGBoost Regressor models using Scikit-Learn to validate hypotheses.

project.title: MongoDB | Express.js | React.js | Node.js | JavaScript | HTML5 | CSS3
project.description1: • A full stack MERN web application with a Material UI appearance.
project.description2: • It allows the user to register/login and store their multiple online credentials and safely logout.
project.description3: • Incorporated CRUD functionality, the use of React hooks, context and JWT authentication.

project.title: Django | Python | JavaScript | HTML5 | CSS3
project.description1: • Innovated a Facebook-type application directed towards youth with a space-theme.
project.description2: • Focused on making an elegant, user-friendly interface by using Django for CRUD functionality.
project.description3: • Uploaded on pythonanywhere.com, capturing a web traffic of 674 within the first two months.
